casename: Chiltern Park Development Pte Ltd v Ong Pang Wee and Others
counsel: Loh Kim Kee ( Martin & Partners ) for the applicants/defendants; Tan Yeow Hiang ( Khattar Wong & Partners ) for the respondents/plaintiffs
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Jurisdiction/Application to transfer proceedings from magistrate's court to High Court/High Court's power to transfer proceedings/Nature of court's power/Whether conflict between O 89 r 2 (1) and scheme of transfer of proceedings under Subordinate Courts Act/Whether High Court has jurisdiction to order transfer/Appropriate course of action/ss 24, 37 & 38 Subordinate Courts Act (Cap 321, 1999 Ed)/s 18, Sch 1 cl 10 Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Cap 322, 1999 Ed)/O 89 r 1 & O 89 r 2 Rules of Court
